page.title: 09UPPER SMITE FARM
page.content: {Upper Smite farm}is a mixed farm.Crops include wheat and barley and the only animals kept are sheep and cows.Accor- ding to the farmer,whose family has owned it for 40 years,the farm house has always been situated where it is now. The area surrounding this farm is mainly used for grazing. Situated in the area of Upper Smite Farm are 2 newly built houses and 4 renovated houses. {OFFERTON FARM Offerton Farm has not changed since it was built many years ago.It has however changed its produce.It became a Dairy and Cattle Farm in 1973. The owner of the farm was a dairy farmer before taking over Offerton.The beef cattle are sold at auctions in the Hereford and Worcester area.The area around the farm has changed very little apart from the motorway.
